Bomberman in JavaFX ğŸ®

In class we were tasked to create a Bomberman game in JavaFX.

The game is a simple implementation of the classic Bomberman game, where the player must navigate a maze and place bombs to destroy obstacles and enemies.

Full project ğŸ“

Team members ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’»-ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ’»

  • Jakubiak
  • Grave
  • Mailly
  • MySelf

Features âœ¨

  • Player can move up, down, left, right
  • Player can place bombs
  • Different types of bombs (with different explosion radius)
  • Enemies that move randomly
  • Different maps variations
item.content:
ğŸ™ Github Source here ğŸ™

Bomberman in JavaFX ğŸ®

In class we were tasked to create a Bomberman game in JavaFX.

The game is a simple implementation of the classic Bomberman game, where the player must navigate a maze and place bombs to destroy obstacles and enemies.

Full project ğŸ“

Team members ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’»-ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ’»

  • Jakubiak
  • Grave
  • Mailly
  • MySelf

Features âœ¨

  • Player can move up, down, left, right
  • Player can place bombs
  • Different types of bombs (with different explosion radius)
  • Enemies that move randomly
  • Different maps variations

Full Class Diagram ğŸ“Š

you can click on the image to see the full size

Special thanks ğŸ™

Shout out to my team members for their hard work and dedication in creating this game.

And a big thank you to Romain Wallon (AKA RW-6) & our teachers for guiding us through the process.

References ğŸ“š

  • Java
  • JavaFX
  • Scene Builder
  • IntelliJ IDEA

item.title: [NEW] Go_Gamedle in GoLang ğŸ¹!
item.description:
ğŸ™ Github source here ğŸ™

Go_Gamedle in GoLang ğŸ¹!

Overview of the game

Go_Gamedle is a simple game that aim to guess a game from a cover image or a description. The game is written in GoLang and use the gin-gonic to display an html page with the game.

ğŸš§ currently Working In Progress ğŸš§

What does this project use ?

  • GoLang
  • Gin (Web framework in GoLang)
  • HTML
  • CSS (Bulma CSS for convenience)

And mostly the API of IGDB which is a video game database.
item.content:
ğŸ™ Github source here ğŸ™

Go_Gamedle in GoLang ğŸ¹!

Overview of the game

Go_Gamedle is a simple game that aim to guess a game from a cover image or a description. The game is written in GoLang and use the gin-gonic to display an html page with the game.

ğŸš§ currently Working In Progress ğŸš§

What does this project use ?

  • GoLang
  • Gin (Web framework in GoLang)
  • HTML
  • CSS (Bulma CSS for convenience)

And mostly the API of IGDB which is a video game database.
